title: Designing a multi-objective energy management system in multiple interconnected water and power microgrids based on the MOPSO algorithm
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Abdulaziz Alkuhayli, Masoud Dashtdar, Aymen Flah, Claude Ziad El-Bayeh, Vojtech Blazek, Lukas Prokop
